Hi, I'm Daniel Thiele. I am a PhD candidate in political science at University of Vienna. In my [research](https://orcid.org/0000-0003-0324-4943){target="_blank"}, I focus on populist communication on social media. I have a strong interest in computational methods and try to contribute useful R-packages [here](https://github.com/thieled){target="_blank"}.
